gcp_intro: Answer a few questions so we can recommend the safest, least-disruptive care next step.
medicaid_clarify: Medicaid is different from Medicare. We can absolutely work with people on Medicare. If someone is on Medicaid or you’re not sure, our advisors can’t arrange placement because Medicaid has its own programs.
medicaid_ack: Concierge Care Advisors can’t arrange services for people on Medicaid. You can still complete the Guided Care Plan and use the Cost Planner. For Medicaid programs and support, visit Medicaid.gov or learn about Long-Term Services & Supports (LTSS).
